A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Considering the chance they had to give the most beloved movie trilogy ever an absolutely amazing sequel; this was a very upsetting and even slightly traumatizing experience. I'd prefer a monthly painful prostate exam before existing in a universe where Star Wars is handled with such irresponsibility.\n\nI'll never watch it again\, twice was 2 times too much. I've fallen into a deep depression. :( </3
